managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to review us.  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our location and proximity to union square.  I will share the feedback about wanting team service in the rooms with our team.  We hope to see you again in the future.

review.title: Great buzzy location but otherwise disappointing
review.reviewText: Rooms are small and really not terribly well equipped - no bar fridge, no kettle (just a coffee maker), and no TEABAGS!!
review.positiveRemarks: Location so close to Union Square.
review.negativeRemarks: Supply of teabags in each room, a bar fridge, and supply of a small quantity of milk to be able to make tea or coffee in the mornings.
review.locationRemarks: Really good location for shopping, tourist buses which leave from Union Square, and also really convenient for the cable car.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for the comments on your recent stay.  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed our location however I apologize if the rest of your visit was less than excellent.  We appreciate you taking the time to review us.

review.title: Find a different hotel
review.reviewText: The room was ridiculously small,  the bathroom was so small it was a joke,  and the bed was like a roll up 4" mattress on an Ikea frame.  Really awful. Staff was ok but not great. The only positive was the location. Do yourself a favor and find a different hotel.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for sharing this with us.  We are pleased you found our location excellent and staff nice.  I am sorry however if you were unsatisfied with your room.  I will review this feedback with the team to help us improve in the future.

review.title: The "urban" room is misleading in all sense
review.reviewText:
The "urban" room is misleading in all sense: small room, old, with a window facing a wall.
It was a total disappointment from what I did saw on the website.
The location is superb, so it's really too bad the room experience is that bad!
review.positiveRemarks: Nice staff, even if nothing was done to improve my disappointment, it did feel I am not the first who feels that way
review.negativeRemarks: clearly display how the urban room looks like, or even close them for guest...

review.title: Tiny but nice
review.reviewText: A good central location but beware this part of SF is expensive. You can walk to the harvest, take the cable car or get the tram. Literally a 2 minute walk from BART so only $8.95 to get to / from the airport. So overall pricey but good location

review.title: I loved the style and location
review.reviewText: Got our booking wrong and didn't have the right room but did discount it.

review.title: Our 1st Anniversary
review.reviewText:
We were warmly welcomed and it just got better. Harvey and Ruben made our stay so much more enjoyable than we anticipated! Harvey was very accommodating and generous being that it was our 1year anniversary. Ruben, who recommended great places to eat and was extremely kind and hospitable made both my husband and I feel right at home, like family! 
  We loved our Sleep and Soak Room, and sleep and soak we did. The room was cozy, sexy and romantic, perfect for celebrating our first year of marriage! 
 The easy access to trolly carts and buses made our daily adventures in San Francisco a breeze. We didn't take advantage of the night life scene, but if that's your cup of tea Harvey would gladly recommend all the Hotspots! 
 To sum it up we loved our stay at Hotel Union Square!  -(the love birds in room 623)

review.title: Awesome Hotel.... Awesome Staff...
review.reviewText: I just relocated to San Francisco and spent my first night in the city at The Hotel Union Square. I enjoyed the hotel so much I extended my stay for a week. The hotel offers many superlatives but I was most impressed with "the staff" as they were friendly and went out of their way to assist me with everything from directions to recommending future living accommodations. I would also give high marks to the hotel's free evening wine hour and gym access. Kudos and many thanks to the staff for making my first week and stay in San Francisco a pleasant one!

managementResponses.response: Thank you for the feedback.  We apologize your visit was less than excellent.  We value your feedback and appreciate you taking the time to let us know.

review.title: Chintzy hotel - terrible place to stay!
review.reviewText:
The room door would not lock from inside as it was a fire escape with the stairs outside the window. Room 328. 
The only room left was an inside room, no window. It was really an awful chintzy hotel.
review.locationRemarks: Who cares? It's a terrible place to stay.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for sharing this unfortunate experience with us.  We are very sorry you were unsatisfied and not able to stay at our property.  I can assure you this is not the check in experience we strive to offer our guests.  Thank you for taking the time to let us know.  We will review this feedback with the team.

review.title: Left hotwl
review.reviewText: I went to the room they assigned me- the room's deadbolt on the door was broken. So I went down to the front desk to let them know and request a different room- they already knew about the broken door lock and was either hoping I didn't notice or didn't care! Upon my frustration and complaining, they switched my room. This second room had dirty sheet and shower. So after this I was so appalled that I just told them to cancel my reservation and I was leaving. I found a Marriott next door and stayed there. This hotel is such a rip off.

review.title: Very nice, nothing mind blowing.
review.reviewText:
Nothing was terrible, but nothing was incredibly amazing either. The window looked out onto a wall in a tiny area with other walls and windows; can't call it a courtyard because it was too small and can't be accessed. Gave the room a dark claustrophobic feel. 

But otherwise it was adequate, quite nice.
Very helpful and knowledgeable staff. Answered all of the questions we had.

review.title: Good location, bad conditions
review.reviewText: Good location, rooms too small, not what You see in the pictures on the internet, there is no restaurant in the hotel

review.title: Great location
review.reviewText: Hotel was in the perfect location to be able to walk around and explore the city. Very clean and nice hotel. Will stay here again

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to review us.  We are sorry to hear your stay was less than excellent.  We value your feedback and appreciate you letting us know.

review.title: Room was no larger than a closet!
review.reviewText: Room no larger than a closet, uncomfortably small, no clock radio, only one side lamp, noisy (I could hear TV noise from next room.  Getting to room was difficult, had to climb extra set of stairs, dark hallways and no privacy.  Way overpriced!  I would not stay there again or ever recommend it to anyone!
review.positiveRemarks: The lemon water they offered at the front door, that is about it
review.locationRemarks: That was the only benefit, close to Union Square.

review.title: Near all the Union Square Shopping
review.reviewText: Great proximity to the Retail District around Union Square and only 2 blocks from the Powell Metro. We had a great time shopping and museum going all within walking distance of the hotel. Staff were very friendly and helpful. The gave us a free upgrade to the Penthouse Suite; great views from the 6th floor! Hotel is older but tastefully remodeled.

review.title: Extremely friendly, helpful & accommodating staff
review.reviewText: I last visited San Francisco when I was only 11 years old so this was like a first visit. From check-in to check-out, the staff helped us navigate food, activities, and where to go, how to get there, and what to do. They always had a map handy which was extremely helpful. Surprisingly quiet given the proximity to the cable cars which are loud.  We are excited to return.

review.title: The hotel was good - nice fit out etc
review.reviewText: There were parts that were very dated, but overall a pretty good experience

managementResponses.response:
Dear Julio,
Thank you, thank you, thank you!
We hope that you will be back soon.
Best regards,

review.title: nice hotel close to everything
review.reviewText: location good , staff was nice , rooms were kinda small but really i was only using room to sleep i was gone pretty much all day , i would recommend this hotel to anyone

managementResponses.response:
Dear Guest,

Thank you very much for your comment. I can't express how disappointed I am by the level of service that was offered to you. I have already have a talk with the Front Desk staff so that  this kind of thing doesn't happen anymore. I want to apologize for the inconvenience. Thank you very much for sharing it with me.
I hope that you will consider staying wit us again and witness improvement by yourself.
Best regards

review.title: This is a great location for visiting SF.
review.reviewText: The understaffed front desk make check in and check out a lengthy process.  The room was tiny with a window facing another window approximately a foot away.  I arrived early and walked up to the desk.  "Can I help you?."  When I told her I was here to check in... "Check in is at three pm."  Blank look.  Can I check my bag and come back?  "Over there."  I also called a couple of hours later just to ask if the room was ready.  There was no room ready and he took my number to text me when it was available.  I arrived around 5 pm obviously without a text to check in.  Then I went to the bell clerk to get my bags to take them to a tiny room with a view of the tiny room about a foot away from the window.
review.positiveRemarks: The location is excellent. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable.
review.locationRemarks: Union square.  Great location.  Close to everything.

managementResponses.response:
Dear Johanna,

Thank you very much for the 5 stars review and for choosing to stay with us. We loved that you loved your stay with us and we are looking forward to having you back soon.
Best regards,

review.title: Great location, nice rooms, comfortable, convenien
review.reviewText:
Loved it!
Will definitely stay again. 
Staff very friendly & accomodating.
Historic SF hotel.
Close to work area.
Good location.
